resources.string:
2014.07.18:
 · Fix: Allegedly only "unpublished" caches for some users on some mobile networks
 
 2014.07.12:
 · Fix: Caches not stored if "Ask for list" is disabled
 · Fix: Use "Unknown" instead of "Mystery" in GPX export to ensure backward compatibility
 · Fix: Avatar not shown in login confirmation screen
 · Fix: Loading more than 40 caches in search results
 
 2014.06.11:
 · Fix: Adapting to changes on gc.com
 · Fix: New gc.com GPX waypoint types recognized
 · Fix: Do not crop static maps to prevent the copyright notice being cut off
 
 2014.05.14:
 · Fix: Adapting to changes on gc.com
 
 2014.04.30:
 · New: Support new cache type: Giga Event
 · New: Integrate with MapsWithMe
 · New: Import external spoiler images from a Garmin-style file structure
 · New: Support more details in GPX export
 · Fix: A number of crash scenarios/instabilities due to memory issues
 · Fix: Problems when calling some external navigation apps
 · Fix: Crash when starting with a readonly cache directory
 · New: Have attended as default log type on day of event
 
 
 Detailed list of all changes
 
 Old releases
 · Please refer to the release notes on the c:geo-website.
 
 
 Known Limitations/Bugs:
 · Live map:
 Approximated coords due to limitations on the GC-website
 Be aware: If navigation is started directly from live map it may also use the approximated coords!
 In fast mode the cache type might be wrong in rare cases
 On low zoom owned/found caches may not be hidden anymore
